page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: } The area covered in the project is located on the west side of Cardiff in an area known as Ely.It has a main road running through it called Cowbridge Road which from the build up of Cardiff as a major commercial centre was the main thoroughfare from the city westward, this has now been superceeded by the M4 Motorway.The area is predominantly urban with pockets of light industry and commerce.It areas of open land .It has a much historical background,with a Roman villa and Hill Fort both located in the area.Also a mill is to be found on the local river Ely which runs through the area from North to South.Although area appears to have many natural advantages the evidence of the 1981 census show it to be a major area of deprivation. cont.
